name: My Toy Cars
description:
My Toy Cars is the educational adventure game for children over the age of 2. Your child will play the role of a policeman, fireman and taxi driver and experience their adventures while driving their cars.

- Take care of your cars, make them shine to look like the new ones! Clean them up in the car wash.

- Attention! Bank robbery in progress! Jump to the police car, drive as fast as you can to the city and catch the robbers!

- The building is on fire all of a sudden! Get to the fire truck and rush to fight the flames and save the citizens!

- It's the rush hours! People are crowded on the taxi stand, trying to catch the taxi and get to their work. Jump in your yellow cab and help them!

Hurry up! Rush for the adventure to the colorful city!

My Toy Cars it an easy and fully safe game. Your child will be able to play it on its own or with parents accompany.

*No in-app purchases
*No advertising
